meanings.sent1: The immunogenetically modified cells showed enhanced resistance to infections.

meanings.sent3: The immunogenetically diverse group of animals made for an interesting research subject.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were as immunogenetically unique as a rare flower in a garden.
